name: MAL back to old "small" icons for cast&crew
description: A few days ago MAL changed the size of images for cast, crew, characters and other things. Not everyone likes this change. Want to go back to the smaller images? This script is for you!

user.name: lifeiscrazy
user.about:
My name is Marr, I'm a twenty-something Dutch girl working in finance. I also like to read, watch anime and I'm pretty skilled with hula hoops.

I could write a book about myself but I'm not gonna do that.

additional_info: I've tested it on the pages it works for, and I didn't notice anything off. Do you spot something that shouldn't be happening? Let me know by sending me a PM on MAL.
